translations: 痛苦，苦难；穷困，悲惨境遇；<英，非正式>老发牢骚的人

sentences.sentence: Fame brought her nothing but misery.
sentences.translation: 名声只给她带来了痛苦。

sentences.sentence: Everything conspired to make her life a misery.
Flinging herself on the bed, she gave way to helpless misery.
sentences.translation: 她一头扑倒在床上，痛苦不堪。
